issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Now that HIVE-7812 is checked in we should remove the hardwiring to HiveInputFormat for the qfile tests.
fields.summary: Remove hardwiring to HiveInputFormat in acid qfile tests

comments.body: Turns out this is more than just a testing issue.  A small change was needed to OrcInputFormat to handle the case when an update or delete is being done to a table in non-acid format.
[~owen.omalley] could you take a look at the changes to OrcInputFormat and make sure they look right?

ATTACHMENT ID: 12670431
Lol. This is your jobconf. This is your jobconf on acid.
Patch committed.  Thanks Owen for the review.
Patch committed to branch-0.14 as well.
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
